## Education/Work Background

I have a Master of Public Administration from UNC-Chapel Hill and a bachelor's degree in American Studies and Hispanic Studies from the College of William & Mary. I currently work as a Research Analyst in the Economic and Public Policy research group at the UMass Donahue Institute, which is part of the UMass Amherst campus.

## R experience

I have no experience with R. I have only used STATA and SPSS.

## Research interests

My research interests are related to economic development, workforce development, and related public policy.

## Hometown

Asheville, NC

## Hobbies

Traveling, hiking, photography, and sewing
